  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.IRegistrar.addMergedConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean)
    use IRegistrar.addFeatureConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean)
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.IRegistrar.addMergedSyncedConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean, boolean)
    use IRegistrar.addFeatureConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean)
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.IPluginInfo
    no replacement. In practice, plugin should never require this.
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.IRegistrar
    use ICommonRegistrar or IClientRegistrar instead.
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.IWailaPlugin
    use IWailaCommonPlugin or IWailaClientPlugin instead.
  • Deprecated Enum Classes
    Enum Class
    Description
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.TooltipPosition
    the usage on registrar are replaced with position specific position methods

    Method
    Description

    use IRegistrar.addFeatureConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean)
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.IRegistrar.addMergedSyncedConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean, boolean)
    use IRegistrar.addFeatureConfig(ResourceLocation, boolean)
    mcp.mobius.waila.api.ITooltipComponent.HorizontalGrowing.getWidth()
    width is dynamically calculated.
